content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); warnings: [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); out of fuel and holding approximately 190 units of water (~15°); now associated with fluid_system [81286] and providing steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) delivering water; now associated with fluid_system [81286] and holding roughly 99.24 units of water (~15°).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a Wooden Chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 81286 (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 81285 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 81298 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 81297 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 81293 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 81302 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 81301 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 81304 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 81305 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 81306 (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection and Fluid System Consistency:
  - Repeated unsuccessful attempts to connect the steam engine to pipe groups using fluid_system identifiers (80622, 80706, 80788, 80872, 80954, 81038, 81120, 81204) reveal a mismatch between the connection parameters and the current pipeline network configuration.
  - Ensure that fluid_system values used in connection attempts are updated to reflect the identifiers assigned to existing pipe groups (e.g., 81286 is now active at the expected hub).
  - Validate candidate pipe groups by dynamically querying their configuration around the target connection point to prevent redundant search failures.
